DocumentUri.description: A tagging type for string properties that are actually document URIs.

FormattingOptions.description:
Value-object describing what options formatting should use.
The FormattingOptions namespace provides helper functions to work with
[FormattingOptions](#FormattingOptions) literals.

insertFinalNewline.description: Insert a newline character at the end of the file if one does not exist.

tabSize.description: Size of a tab in spaces.

trimFinalNewlines.description: Trim all newlines after the final newline at the end of the file.

trimTrailingWhitespace.description: Trim trailing whitespaces on a line.

TextDocumentIdentifier.description:
A literal to identify a text document in the client.
The TextDocumentIdentifier namespace provides helper functions to work with
[TextDocumentIdentifier](#TextDocumentIdentifier) literals.

uinteger.description: Defines an unsigned integer in the range of 0 to 2^31 - 1.

workDoneToken.description: An optional token that a server can use to report work done progress.
